CURRICULUM VITAE 
Name 
Trương Võ Thiên Vũ 
Job Title 
Senior Software Engineer 
Overview 
Personal 
Date of birth: 20-Feb-1992 
Gender: Male 
Nationality: Vietnamese 
Country/Region: Vietnam 
Phone: 01227303583 
Email: truongvothienvu92@gmail.com 
Personal Statement 
A good team-player, well-adapted and experienced software engineer. Excellent programming skills, 
thorough knowledge of .Net and Angular frameworks, as well as proficiency in time management. I 
always enjoy challenging and can work well under pressure; my other strengths are a strong commitment 
to customer services, and attention to detail. I am highly motivated and enjoy challenges within a new or 
existing role. 
Achievement 
 Staff of the year 2018 (Saigon Technology Solutions) 
Skill Summary 
● 
Tech-stack: ASP.NET MVC, RESTful API, Sitecore CMS, .Net Core 2.1, Fluent API, 
Angular, SignalR, MSSQL, C#, SQL, jQuery, Javascript, Entity Framework, NUnit, XUnit. 
● 
Tools: Visual Studio; Microsoft SQL Server; GIT; SourceTree; Jira; VSTS 
● 
Cloud: Azure, Google Cloud Platform (App Engine, Computing Engine) 
● 
English: IELTS 6.5 (March 2019)
